location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Notification that Stannus had granted three sets of bills of exchange [two listed] on the Honourable Board to meet the demands of the Residency in favour of Mirza Syed Mahomed and Jabatoboy Ramdass.
